Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to opting in to the State Neighbor Notification Law concerning the application of pesticides.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Opting in to the State Neighbor Notification Law concerning the application of pesticides.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the reduction of pesticide use by city agencies.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Reduction of pesticide use by city agencies.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Senate to pass S.2095-A, which would establish a State Urban Pesticide Board.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Regarding the establishment of a State Urban Pesticide Board. (S.2095-A)

Items.Title: Resolution honoring the special skills of the medical staff at The Children’s Hospital at Montefiore who performed surgeries for Carl and Clarence Aguirre, honoring the bravery of these two young children and their mother, Arlene Aguirre, and expressing the enthusiasm of this City and the world in their successful recovery for a bright future.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Honor the special skills of the medical staff at The Children’s Hospital at Montefiore.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to opting in to the State Neighbor Notification Law concerning the application of pesticides.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Opting in to the State Neighbor Notification Law concerning the application of pesticides.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to the reduction of pesticide use by city agencies.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Reduction of pesticide use by city agencies.

Items.Title: Resolution calling upon the New York State Senate to pass S.2095-A, which would establish a State Urban Pesticide Board.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
Items.MatterName: Regarding the establishment of a State Urban Pesticide Board. (S.2095-A)

Items.Title: Resolution honoring the special skills of the medical staff at The Children’s Hospital at Montefiore who performed surgeries for Carl and Clarence Aguirre, honoring the bravery of these two young children and their mother, Arlene Aguirre, and expressing the enthusiasm of this City and the world in their successful recovery for a bright future.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
Items.MatterName: Honor the special skills of the medical staff at The Children’s Hospital at Montefiore.
